name: WhichWine
0:
”Alexa, Open Which Wine”
”What's the pairing for a salmon burger?”
”What's the pairing for a steak?”
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: which wine
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Tell Alexa to "Open Which Wine" and have Which Wine give you the perfect wine pairing for your meal! Which Wine knows several thousand wine pairings and wants to help you perfectly pair your food! Just tell Pinot a food and he will respond with the perfect wine! 

Which Wine uses machine learning to find the perfect wine pairing for whatever you are eating, whether it’s fish tacos, steak or even ice cream!

--- Example Commands ---

"Alexa, open Which Wine"
"Pair Chicken Caeser Salad"
"Pair pizza"
"Pair Belgian Waffles"
"What's the wine pairing for a steak?"
"Stop"
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
